# label

**Instance Property**

A string that identifies the argument buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var label: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Object and command labels are useful identifiers at runtime or when profiling and debugging your app using any Metal tool. See [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Xcode/Naming-resources-and-commands].

## Identifying the argument encoder

- **device**: The device object that created the argument encoder.

items.description: The device object that created the argument encoder.
